ygData.subject: Re: Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: If someone on E ci had the Mystical Alliance tag over his head, then something is not right. I have not even gotten onto that server yet to get the guild set
ygData.messageBody:
If someone on E'ci had the Mystical Alliance tag over his head, then something
is not right. I have not even gotten onto that server yet to get the guild set
up. Are you sure it said Mystical Alliance?

Currently, we are official on only Brell Serilis. I am spending many hours
online on Innoruuk and also Xegony trying find a GM online to set up our guild
tags. So far, no luck. Hopefully, I can get at least one of the servers set up
tonight. I will wander around between the 2 above and Bristlebane, Veeshan and
E'ci till I see one with a GM and then /petition.

Please verify if someone on E'ci has our guild tag over his head, because that
is a mistake if he does.

scollier@... wrote:

> From: scollier@...
>
> Who is a guild member on E'ci ? I expected either myself or Marlys to
> be contacted about it. Ran into someone name Aligrate or some such last
> night who had our logo above his head. But he was no help, said there was
> someone else I needed to talk to about the guild. Help!
>
> Kal-ell
>
